alert.note: Alert for Musselshell (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 09 at 3:37PM MDT until June 10 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Montana... Musselshell River near Roundup affecting Musselshell County. .Recent heavy rainfall has caused a rapid rise on the Musselshell River at Roundup. The river should peak late this afternoon then begin a rapid fall this evening. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL JUST AFTER MIDNIGHT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Musselshell River near Roundup. * WHEN...Until midnight tonight. * IMPACTS...Low lying areas along the Musselshell River will experience minor flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:15 PM MDT Friday the stage was 10.2 feet. - Forecast...The river should peak late this afternoon, then fall back below flood stage this evening. The river is expected to remain below flood stage through the weekend, though locally heavy additional rain is possible tonight and Saturday, so please monitor the forecast and stay aware. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 pm) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Musselshell River Roundup 10.0 10.2 Fri 3 pm 10.4 8.3 8.2 &&
info.instruction: Please report observed flooding to local emergency officials and request they pass the information to the National Weather Service in Billings. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Do not drive on or attempt to cross flooded roads, find an alternate route. Roads and driveways may be damaged or washed out in places. The latest stages and forecasts for rivers and streams can be found at our web page: https://water.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight by 1200 AM MDT.
